backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all backend types (messages, video/email requests, coin transactions, user profiles) and importing modules for Stripe, HTTP outcalls, and access control. Serves as the core backend canister for the Wrapper AI application.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features related to Groq API key integration fixes, including API key validation, error handling improvements, and env variable cleanup, each mapped to relevant files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend codebase structure and purpose.
frontend/.env: Frontend environment variables file with a placeholder Stripe publishable key and an empty VITE_GROQ_API_KEY, directing users to enter their Groq API key in the app settings instead.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variables file documenting the required VITE_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY and VITE_GROQ_API_KEY variables with format hints and source URLs; contains a sample (likely expired) Groq API key.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind base styles and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Wrapper AI frontend, setting the page title and meta description and mounting the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that initializes a memoized QueryClient, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders AppContent alongside a Toaster notification component.
frontend/src/components/AppContent.tsx: Authentication gate component that shows a loading spinner during initialization, an error alert on login failure, the LoginScreen when unauthenticated, or the AuthenticatedLayout when a valid identity is present.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedLay: Main layout for authenticated users providing a sticky header with navigation, coin balance display, admin panel link, mobile menu, and a router that renders the correct screen component based on the current hash route.
frontend/src/components/CoinGate.tsx: A gate component that checks the user's coin balance and displays an insufficient coins alert with a 'Buy Coins' button if the balance is below the required action cost.
frontend/src/components/CoinPurchaseDial: A dialog component that displays available coin purchase plans fetched from the backend and initiates a Stripe checkout session when the user selects a plan and clicks purchase.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: A card component that displays the user's recent coin transaction history (up to 10 entries), showing credits and debits with timestamps and running balance.
frontend/src/constants/coins.ts: Defines coin-related constants including action costs, low balance threshold, and user-facing insufficient/low balance messages.
frontend/src/constants/languages.ts: Exports a readonly array of 60+ language options (value/label pairs) for use in script, voice, and subtitle language selectors.
frontend/src/hooks/coinQueryKeys.ts: Centralizes React Query cache keys for coin-related queries: balance, plans, and transaction history.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAddCoins.ts: A mutation hook that calls the backend's adminAddCoins method to add a specified coin amount to a target principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIImageGenerator.t: A hook that manages AI image generation by checking coin balance, charging coins via the backend actor, and calling an external image generation API, with placeholder credentials to be replaced.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIVideoMaker.ts: A hook that provides script and storyboard generation functions by calling the backend actor with video request parameters built from a form data object.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Provides a chat hook that manages message state, sends messages to the Groq API (with image attachment support), maintains multi-turn conversation history, and handles coin-related errors with balance invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinBalance.ts: Fetches the current user's coin balance from the backend actor using React Query, waiting until the actor is ready.
Fetches the list of available coin purchase plans from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useColdEmailGenerator: Provides a hook to generate cold emails via the backend actor, handling loading state, coin-insufficiency errors, and invalidating coin-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateStripeChecko: Mutation hook that creates a Stripe checkout session for a given coin purchase plan by calling the backend actor with shopping item details and return URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Manages hash-based client-side routing by reading and updating the URL hash, returning the current view and a navigate function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend actor to determine whether the current caller has admin privileges, returning the result via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the backend actor, with cache invalidation on save.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoins.ts: Mutation hook that purchases coins for a given plan ID via the backend actor and invalidates coin balance and transaction queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoinsWithS: Mutation hook that completes a Stripe-based coin purchase by passing the session ID and plan ID to the backend actor, then invalidates coin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoPackGenerator.t: Hook that calls the backend actor to generate an SEO pack (title, description, tags) for a video, managing loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubtitlesGenerator: Hook that generates subtitles via the backend actor, parsing the result into normal and SRT formats and falling back to a local SRT generator if needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactionHistory: Fetches the current user's coin transaction history from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceoverGenerator: Hook that sends a voiceover generation request to the backend actor with script, voice, language, speed, and emotion parameters, managing loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeScript.ts: Custom React hook that generates YouTube video scripts by building a structured prompt from form data and calling the backend's `generateVideoResponse` actor method, with coin balance invalidation and error handling for insufficient coins.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for the app's color theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelScreen.tsx: Admin-only page that allows administrators to manually add coins to a user account by entering a principal ID and amount, with access control and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/buildP: A utility function that generates a formatted text-based video timeline plan from form data and photo order, serving as a placeholder since real MP4 rendering is unsupported.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/musicL: Defines the MusicTrack interface and generates a mock library of up to 1500 tracks across 12 categories for use in the music library panel.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/MusicL: A panel component displaying a searchable, filterable list of music tracks from the music library, allowing the user to select a track for their video.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/PhotoT: A component for uploading and reordering photos to build a video timeline, supporting add, remove, and move-up/down operations.
frontend/src/pages/AIChatScreen.tsx: Chat UI page that supports sending messages with file attachments to a Groq-backed AI, includes an API key setup flow with validation, and shows a coin purchase dialog for balance management.
frontend/src/pages/AIImageGeneratorScree: Page for generating AI images from a text prompt, displaying coin balance, enforcing coin cost requirements, and providing a download button for the generated image.
frontend/src/pages/AIVideoMakerScreen.ts: Page for creating AI-assisted videos with controls for generating scripts, storyboards, animation plans, and a photo timeline, along with music library and upload options.
frontend/src/pages/ColdEmailScreen.tsx: A form-based page that collects sender/target details and options to generate cold emails via the useColdEmailGenerator hook, displaying the output with copy and reset functionality. Includes a CoinPurchaseDialog triggered when the user has insufficient coins.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardScreen.tsx: The main dashboard page showing the user's authentication status, coin balance, and navigation cards for all AI features. Displays low-balance alerts and integrates CoinPurchaseDialog and TransactionHistoryPanel.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: A login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, handles popup-blocker detection, and redirects to the dashboard upon successful login. Displays error alerts and loading state during the login flow.
A simple screen shown after a cancelled or failed Stripe payment, informing the user no charges were made and offering buttons to retry or return to the dashboard.
Handles post-Stripe-checkout processing by parsing session and plan IDs from the URL hash and calling usePurchaseCoinsWithStripe to credit coins, displaying pending, success, or error states accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileScreen.tsx: A profile management page that lets authenticated users view and update their display name and avatar, copy their principal ID, and log out. Uses useGetCallerUserProfile and useSaveCallerUserProfile hooks for data fetching and persistence.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDefinitionScre: A form-based screen for defining project requirements (goal, target users, key features, constraints) with a summary view shown after submission.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Script: A tab component for configuring and generating a YouTube video script via an AI hook, displaying the parsed result with copy functionality and a coin-purchase prompt on insufficient balance.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/SeoPac: React tab component for generating YouTube SEO packs (titles, description, tags, hashtags, pinned comment, chapters) from a video title and main topic, with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Subtit: React tab component for generating subtitles (normal and SRT format) from a script, voiceover, or pasted text, with options for language and style, plus copy and SRT download actions.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Voiceo: React tab component for generating voiceover scripts with configurable voice gender, language, speed, and emotion, supporting both reuse of a script-tab script and manual paste input.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeScriptScreen.t: A tabbed screen for YouTube content creation that coordinates state (generated script and voiceover) across Script, Voiceover, Subtitles, and SEO Pack tabs.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoMakerSummary.t: Utility function that serializes an AIVideoMakerFormData object into a human-readable summary string listing all video settings.
frontend/src/utils/coinErrors.ts: Utility functions to detect insufficient-coins errors and return appropriate user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImageFile.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser download of an image from a given URL by programmatically clicking a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/utils/downloadTextFile.ts: Utility function that creates a Blob from a text string and triggers a browser download with the specified filename.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Collection of utility functions for handling image file attachments in chat, including conversion between File/Uint8Array/Blob URL, validation of type and size, and retrieving image dimensions.
frontend/src/utils/parseYouTubeScript.ts: Parses a raw YouTube script string delimited by ### headings into ordered ScriptSection objects following a standard section order (Hook, Introduction, Main Points, etc.).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk), oklch-based color tokens, border radius variants, accordion keyframe animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for 'Wrapper AI', a Hindi/Urdu chat app using the Groq API, tracking known issues (broken API key auth), existing fix features (key storage, validation, error handling), and a pending action request to fully repair the Groq API integration.
